publ: by VayuVaidya: Dr Bheemaiah, Anil Kumar
name: LittleMonkeysHeart
0:
”Alexa, open monkey story”
”Alexa, start monkey story”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: monkey story
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. 
Dry-Land Humans are represented by the crocodiles, while the more evolved humanity, by the little monkey, in this timeless fable, you witness, Mrs Croc in you - eager to learn all the secrets of life, the little monkey's heart, and in the process acquire the ice, clay and steel hearts. But will the Mrs Croc in you turn heartless and never learn the little monkey's heart? Find out for yourself.....
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
